title: Taken Love
description: Book They say you can't control when you first fall in love or who you fall in love with. So, when Kathleen found herself in love for the first time at seventeen, it was a bit shocking. Not for the reasons you think, but then again, maybe it was. His name was Johnathan Pierce. He drove her insane with lust and frustrated her to no end. How could she not fall for him? How could any girl refuse his green eyes, experienced touch and intoxicating words? Her senior year of high school had plenty of surprises awaiting her. Now, it’s been six years since her heart was taken by Johnathan, a man who is CEO of his very own empire. As life grew for him in a direction of success, it stalled for her in the love department. The pain she endured from her senior year, hurt her in the worst way imaginable. It caused her to give up everything and run away. The indescribable pain she’s felt has secretly consumed her for six long years, but now the time has come for her to return home. Where it all starts for a girl named; Kathleen Toth-Chamberlin. This a standalone novel that now includes bonus chapters.
author: K.C. Royale
